info.title: ITA Profiles page API documentation
info.description:
API Rest documentation used on ITA Profiles WEB. Some useful links below:
 *   [ITA Profles Backend Repository](https://github.com/IT-Academy-BCN/ita-profiles-backend)
 *   [ITA Profiles Frontend Repository](https://github.com/IT-Academy-BCN/ita-profiles-frontend)
 *   [ITA Profiles WEB](https://ornate-dieffenbachia-e0ff84.netlify.app)

get.summary: Retrieve a list of additional training

get.description: Get a list of all admins. Requires admin role and valid token.

200.description: Successful operation. Returns a list of admins.

401.description: Unauthorized. Token is missing or invalid.

403.description: Forbidden. User does not have the necessary permissions (admin role).

201.description: Admin created successfully. No token is returned.

403.description: Forbidden. Missing authentication token or admin role.

404.description: Not Found. Administrator with specified ID not found.

put.description: Update the details of a specific administrator. Requires admin role and valid token.

401.description: You do not have permission to modify this user

404.description: Not Found. Administrator with specified ID not found.

delete.description: Delete a specific admin by their ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the admin to be deleted

message.example: Unauthorized. Missing authentication token or admin role.
No admins found in the database

200.description: Successful. Development list retrieved from json file

parameters.name: studentId

message3.example: No s'ha trobat cap currículum per a l'estudiant amb id: {studentId}

get.description:
Get a list of all students registered with the Profile-Home fields in Figma Design.

- If a 'specialization' parameter is provided, the list will be filtered by student's specialization.

- If not, it returns a list of all students.

- Multiple parameters can be added separated by commas without spaces.

- For example, if the objetive is to filter Backend and Frontend students, the query would be:

    ```/student/list/for-home?specialization=frontend,backend```
    - To filter by tags, the query would be:
    ```/student/list/for-home?tags=PHP,Laravel```
    - To filter by both specialization and tags:
    ```/student/list/for-home?specialization=frontend&tags=php,react```

---

    No authentication required

parameters.name: specialization
parameters.description: The specializations to filter students by

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags to filter students by

project_site.description: Site where the project is happening
